\newcommand{\Kron}[1][ij]{\KroneckerDelta[#1]}

\newcommand{\TensorSP}[1]{\TensorSymbolicPrintedBold{#1}}
\newcommand{\TensorSPS}[1]{\TensorSymbolicPrintedScript{#1}}
\newcommand{\TensorSW}[2]{%
\def\OrderI{I}
\def\OrderII{II}
\def\OrderIII{III}
\def\FirstArg{#1}
\def\SecondArg{#2}
  \ifx\SecondArg\OrderI
    \ensuremath{\TensorSymbolicWrittenOrderI{#1}}
    \else
      \ifx\SecondArg\OrderII
        \ensuremath{\TensorSymbolicWrittenOrderII{#1}}
          \else
            \ifx\SecondArg\OrderIII
              \ensuremath{\TensorSymbolicWrittenOrderIII{#1}}
                \else 
                  \ensuremath{\TensorSymbolicWrittenOrderIV{#1}}
                \fi
           \fi 
      \fi
  
}
